column3: butea frondosa will strengthen your hair and eclipta alba will improve the texture of your hair. You can bid farewell to your hair fall issue with this Himalaya Shampoo. Besides preventing hair breakage
column4: this natural Shampoo will leave your hair hydrated. With the presence of the antifungal property in this Shampoo
column5: your hair will be protected from germs. This paraben-free Shampoo is safe to use on artificially colored hair and will promise to take care of your weak hair. After your fun volley ball match
column6: you can wash your hair with this unique Shampoo and feel fresh. Suitable for all hair types
column7:
this Shampoo from Himalaya will help you get that perfect shine on-the-go no matter what type of hair you have.

Directions for Use

column1: Dispense an adequate amount of this shampoo onto your palm.
Massage gently on wet hair and work up a lather.
Rinse off.
